IndexPage.description1: Trello brings all your tasks, teammates, and tools together
IndexPage.description2: Keep everything in the same placeâ€”even if your team isn't.

header.createBoardsDesc: A boards is mede up of cards ordered on list. Use it to manage project, track information, or organize anything
header.createWorkspaceDesc: A workspace is a group of boards and people. Use it to organize your company, side hustle, family, or friends.

setting.p1: Free Trello workspaces will be limited to 10 collaborators starting April 8, 2024.
setting.p2: Free workspaces will soon be limited to 10 members, guests, and invitations pending.
setting.p3: On April 8, 2024, you won't be able to invite new collaborators to a Free Workspace that reaches or exceeds the limit.
setting.p4: On May 20, 2024, dashboards in Free Workspaces that exceed limits will become view-only.
setting.p5: To manage collaborators, check out the Workspace membership page.

deleteWorkspace.note1: This is permanent and cannot be undone
deleteWorkspace.note2: All tables in the workspace will be deleted
deleteWorkspace.note4: Board members will not be able to interact with closed boards
deleteWorkspace.note5: Enter the workspace name to delete
